p: The listed authors contributed to this work as described in the following: N.S.A., A.E.S. A.A.K.A., and M.E.H. gave the concepts of the work, interpreted the results and the experimental part, and prepared the manuscript; A.E.-G.E.A. cooperated in the preparation of the manuscript; and E.A.E. performed the cytotoxic analysis of the new compounds. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
